mapper.update:
UPDATE so_package
user_id = #{userId},
so_id = #{soId},
so_child_id = #{soChildId},
receiver_address_id = #{receiverAddressId},
order_code = #{orderCode},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
so_child_delivery_fee = #{soChildDeliveryFee},
package_type = #{packageType},
delivery_code = #{deliveryCode},
delivery_status = #{deliveryStatus},
delivery_mode = #{deliveryMode},
delivery_company_id = #{deliveryCompanyId},
delivery_company_name = #{deliveryCompanyName},
delivery_message = #{deliveryMessage},
order_delivery_method_id = #{orderDeliveryMethodId},
good_receiver_name = #{goodReceiverName},
good_receiver_mobile = #{goodReceiverMobile},
pro_city_area = #{proCityArea},
delivery_date = #{deliveryDate},
good_receiver_address = #{goodReceiverAddress},
delivery_name = #{deliveryName},
delivery_name_mobile = #{deliveryNameMobile},
sign_name = #{signName},
sign_date = #{signDate},
sign_remark = #{signRemark},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
